amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike the earmark for the Angel Island State Park Immigration Station Hospital Rehabilitation project.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in part E of House Report 111-184 to strike the earmark for the Angel Island State Park Immigration Station Hospital Rehabilitation project.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Campbell amendment (A010) Failed by recorded vote: 131 - 296 (Roll no. 473).
